info.title: Simon
info.author: teknecal
info.details:
Everyones favourite memory game makes it to the Nintendo Wii.
		
Use the Wiimote as below and rotate 45 degrees clockwise (you'll get the hang of it).
[ + - - oo]

Up Button = Red
Right Button = Green
Left Button = Blue
Down Button = Yellow

In the main screen, use up and down to increase / decrease the animation speed.
